Package gametools

A lightweight and simple to use library for creating 2D games in Java.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Animation
    Used to animate game objects such as sprites.
    Area
    Used for basic positioning and collision.
    Game
    Manages game input, the game window and the output displayed.
    Graphic
    Combines the area and animation classes into one object.
    Group
    Class for managing and updating groups of sprites.
    Position
    A terse class used to shorten positioning code.
    Script
    Abstract class for adding custom script code to sprites.
    Sound
    An easy to use class for sound playback that wraps the java clip class.
    Sprite
    Used for adding movement and behavior for graphics.
    Tools
    A collection of methods to be used across the game.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Area.Collision
    The different methods for testing collision between two objects.
    Area.Corner
    The corners of the object.
    Graphic.UpdateType
    The different ways of drawing the object.
    Sprite.Direction
    The predefined directions the sprite can move in.
    Sprite.Rotation
    The directions in which the sprite can rotate.

Package gametools Description

A lightweight and simple to use library for creating 2D games in Java.
